tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE safety_incident_reports (
    incident_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location TEXT,
    description TEXT,
    reporter TEXT,
    status TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Safety_Incident_Reports (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    location VARCHAR(255),
    description TEXT,
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Investigations (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    investigator_name VARCHAR(255),
    investigation_date DATE,
    findings TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE safety_incidents (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date DATE,
    incident_description TEXT,
    location TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_categories (
    category_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    category_name TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_reports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_id INT,
    reported_by TEXT,
    report_description TEXT,
    report_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE investigation_details (
    investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    investigator_name TEXT,
    investigation_notes TEXT,
    investigation_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE safety_incident_reports (
  incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_date DATE,
  department VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE incident_investigations (
  investigation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incident_id INT,
  investigator VARCHAR(255),
  investigation_date DATE,
  findings TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE investigators (
  investigator_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE departments (
  department_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE incident_types (
  type_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  type_name VARCHAR(255)
)
